divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading outside to see whether I needed to put Frost Netting on my gardens as it was supposed to be a clear, cold night. I looked up to see whether it was a clear night - or had clouded over (it was starting to cloud over - light wispy clouds) - and noticed a bunch (roughly 9) of bright coloured lights (some Red (3), some Green (6)) travelling in an Easterly Direction in a rough Diamond like formation. The lights looked like little fluorescent balls. It continued in this formation, moving at the same speed, until it had moved out of sight (horizon , distance wise). It was probably in sight for about 1 minute. I am not sure what it was - but I know what it wasnt. I have spent many nights out in the spa pool and have seen planes, satellites and shooting stars on many occasions - this was not any of them. Afterwards I was excited and bewildered - but also disappointed that no one else was home to see it too. I then attempted to make contact with the Local Meteorolgical and Astrnomical Societies - to advise them on what I saw - as maybe someone else saw it too.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Hamilton
There were no other sightings in Hamilton on or around September 26th 2008
Summary: Bright Lights Travelling In Formation - Some Green (6), Some Red (3)
